cnbc.title: Fed responds to Trump effort to fire Lisa Cook, notes president needs 'cause'
cnbc.summary: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook hired Abbe Lowell to fight her termination by President Trump for a case that could land at the Supreme Court.

cnbc.title: Trump says he'll have a Fed 'majority' soon to push rates lower after firing Cook
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump said he will soon have a "majority" of preferred members on the Federal Reserve board who will back his desire to slash interest rates.

cnbc.title: Cracker Barrel scraps new logo after outrage from customers, Trump
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump's criticism came a day after Cracker Barrel told customers the company could have better handled its controversial logo rebranding.

cnbc.title: Trump administration pulls additional $175 million from California high-speed rail project
cnbc.summary: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy announced he was withdrawing an additional $175 million from California's high-speed rail project.

cnbc.title: Okta raises forecast as CEO says economic conditions were ‘better than we thought’
cnbc.summary: One of Okta's partners, Palo Alto Networks, recently announced an agreement to buy Okta competitor CyberArk.

cnbc.title: Trump Pentagon weighing equity stakes in defense contractors like Lockheed, says Lutnick
cnbc.summary: The Trump administration is "thinking about" whether the U.S. should take stakes in top defense contractors, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said.

cnbc.title: Taylor Swift sporting 'cushion cut' engagement ring gives Signet Jewelers stock a brief pop
cnbc.summary: The singer announced her engagement to football player Travis Kelce.

cnbc.title: Trump's Cook firing will likely end up in the Supreme Court's hands
cnbc.summary: Trump is the first president to attempt to fire a Fed governor since Congress established the central bank in 1913, Evercore ISI said.

cnbc.title: Apple announces launch event on Sept. 9, iPhone 17 expected
cnbc.summary: Apple is expected to release the iPhone 17, as it usually launches new models in September.

cnbc.title: Healthy Returns: Eli Lilly’s chief scientific officer breaks down the latest obesity pill data
cnbc.summary: Eli Lilly's Daniel Skovronsky talks the latest orforglipron trial, while UnitedHealth Group CEO Stephen Hemsley is moving quickly on a strategic turnaround.
